body:
This patches in commit id `3637a87f986c` from `robertu94/sz@master` for `sz@2.1.8.1:2.1.8.3`, which makes ctags functionality optional unless requested. @robertu94's commit has been merged into `sz@master` and this patch makes it available for `sz@2.1.8.1:2.1.8.3`. Fixes https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/16933 .

@disheng222
title: SZ: make ctags optional via patch from robertu94/sz 3637a87f986c
